overview: The definitive documentary about the iconic television series developed by Gerry and Sylvia Anderson and their production companies (AP Films and Century 21 Pictures). Supermarionation was a revolutionary technique used in all their programmes throughout the 1960s including Stingray, Captain Scarlet and, most famously, Thunderbirds.
tagline: The definitive documentary about the iconic Supermarionation television series by Gerry and Sylvia Anderson
title: Filmed in Supermarionation
